mapper.select: SELECT mem_slot.* FROM v_member_slotitem mem_slot INNER JOIN t_member_ship_slotitem_mapping m ON mem_slot.`member_id` = m.`member_id` AND mem_slot.`ID` = m.`member_slotitem_id` INNER JOIN v_member_ship mem_ship ON mem_ship.`member_id` = m.`member_id` AND mem_ship.`ID` = m.`member_ship_id` WHERE mem_slot.`member_id` = #{member_id} AND m.`member_ship_id` = #{ship_id} ORDER BY POSITION( CAST(mem_slot.`ID` AS CHAR) IN mem_ship.`SLOT`)
